definition: hypothetical or theoretical and not expected to produce an immediate or practical result, an educator who works at a college or university
details:
adjective
- hypothetical or theoretical and not expected to produce an immediate or practical result
= example: hypothetical or theoretical and not expected to produce an immediate or practical result
- marked by a narrow focus on or display of learning especially its trivial aspects
= synonyms: donnish, pedantic
- associated with academia or an academy
= example: associated with academia or an academy
noun
- an educator who works at a college or university
= synonyms: academician, faculty member
